turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I was wondering if you could help me order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza from bella luna ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: four.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok 4 pizzas, what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, on one of them, can I please get ricotta and spinach? On the second one, can I do pepperoni? The third one, mushrooms, and the fourth one, meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me repeat that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have 4 large pizzas, 1 riccota and spanish, 1 pepperoni, 1 mushrooms, and 1 meatlovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Can I please get extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want extra cheese on all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me get your totals for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with 4 large pizza your total comes to 96 dollars, shall we order it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you so much for your help No, that's it. Thank you. All right. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can do for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, have a good day.
